Text.Page:
Our weapons are thrashed from dealing with the gutrends day in and day out. We desperately need to repair them, but we don't have enough Shadmetal Ore.

I've got so many other things to fix that I don't have time to find the {@RawItem:206808} we need—but if you don't have any pressing business, maybe you could collect some for me?
Excellent! This is just what I need to make the repairs! Thanks so much.
Please—without that {@RawItem:206808}, our soldiers can't fight!
